definition: to take a photo as a souvenir/a souvenir photo
to leave (a message etc)/to retain/to stay/to remain/to keep/to preserve

sentences.english: Calvin in front of the United Nations Building. NYC.
sentences.chinese: 豚豚在紐約聯合國大樓前面留影。

sentences.english: My little sister and I were in Renmin Park in Jiaozuo City in the winter of 1983.
sentences.chinese: 1983年冬天，小妹和我在焦作市人民公園留影。

sentences.english: Geneva's most photographed sites is undoubtedly the flower clock.
sentences.chinese: 毫無疑問，日內瓦爲人留影最多的一個景點是花鐘。

sentences.english: Dear to each other in the USA, let a person infinite memories, good happiness.
sentences.chinese: 相親相愛的留影讓人無限回憶，美好了幸福。

sentences.english: It was pleasant to take a photo by the side of the Thames in Wandsworth, London.
sentences.chinese: 在倫敦溫斯和輔泰晤士河畔留影，一樂也。

sentences.english: My little sister and I were in Renmin Park in Jiaozuo City in 1983.
sentences.chinese: 1983年，小妹和我在焦作市人民公園留影。

sentences.english: Be sure i should take one on the steps.
sentences.chinese: 一定要在臺階上留影一張。

sentences.english: One of Geneva's most photographed sites is undoubtedly the flower clock.
sentences.chinese: 毫無疑問，日內瓦爲人留影最多的一個景點是花鐘。

sentences.english: A Chinese tourist poses near mountains peaks at the Kumgang mountain resort in North Korea.
sentences.chinese: 一箇中國遊客在朝鮮金剛山山頂附近留影。

sentences.english: At peony river, I arrived eight females of the Zhao hurl river statue front take photograph.
sentences.chinese: 在牡丹江，我到了著名的八女投江塑像前留影。

sentences.english: We took photos in front of the whale fountain at the entrance to the park.
sentences.chinese: 我們在公園入口處的鯨魚噴泉前留影。

sentences.english: I was in Beijing Zoo in Beijing in Febrary, 1992.
sentences.chinese: 1992年2月，我在北京動物園獅虎山前留影。

sentences.english: Mustangs are an after image of the west, no better than ghosts, hardly there at all.
sentences.chinese: 而野馬就是西部殘留影象，猶如鬼魅，幾乎不見蹤影。

sentences.english: The following are some of the photos during the trip.
sentences.chinese: 以下就是那幾天當中的一些留影。

sentences.english: You may take photos here for memory.
sentences.chinese: 各位嘉賓不妨在此留影紀念。

sentences.english: Following that we posed for some photo's and then set of to conquer the little mountain.
sentences.chinese: 我們拍了幾張留影，然後就踏上征服這座小山的旅程。

definition: to keep as a souvenir/to recall fondly
to take a joint photo/group photo
to offer flowers/to lay flowers (as a memorial)
to take in/to absorb/to assimilate/to act for/to take a photo/photo shoot/photo/to conserve (one's health)
to take a photograph/photography/to shoot (a movie)
to collect local cultural material (recording folk songs, taking photos etc)
